price: I on izađe iz odaje svoje u kojoj se molio pred narod svoj i znakom im dade na znanje: “Veličajte Ga i slavite ujutro i navečer.”
arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
